subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A.’s executive of the year trophy rarely goes to a team with a middling record, but the Knicks’ interim general manager Glen Grunwald demands consideration.
snippet: The N.B.A.’s executive of the year trophy rarely goes to a team with a middling record, but the Knicks’ interim general manager Glen Grunwald demands consideration.
